title: Strictly star Alex Scott and dancer Neil Jones deny there's romance between them
text:
Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Former footballer Alex Scott and her Strictly Come Dancing partner Neil Jones have said there is no romance between them, and they are too "immersed" in the show to consider otherwise.

Neil has also said that he is content being single after splitting from his wife and co-star Katya Jones, and that he is not interested in going on dating apps to find love.

Alex and Neil’s chemistry on the dancefloor sparked some speculation among fans, but Alex swiftly batted off the rumours, saying: "It's great that everyone can see how well me and Neil get on, and that we do have this great partnership and it's not just for TV.

"But we're not thinking anything about that. We're together all the time training, and we're so immersed in Strictly and doing everything for the show, so that stuff hasn't even entered our thoughts."

Neil added that he and Alex are "dancing, dancing, dancing, (having) a little bit of sleep, dancing, dancing, dancing..."

(Image: PA)

Alex said that viewers "have fun seeing just our personality and how much we're just enjoying every Saturday night, which is great - watching the show that's what you want."

Former Arsenal player Alex said she has not had any extra attention since being on the show, joking that potential suitors may be "scared" of her.

"No-one's sliding into my DMs yet," she quipped.

(Image: PA)

Neil, who split from wife and fellow Strictly pro Katya in August, said that he is focusing on dancing and on the programme.

The couple had been together for 11 years and celebrated their sixth wedding anniversary earlier this year.

Their separation came months after Katya was pictured kissing her former Strictly celeb partner, comedian Seann Walsh, last October.

However the dancing couple were adamant the kiss was not the cause of their split, indicating their marriage had become more a friendship than a romance.

(Image: Supplied by WENN)

Freshly single Neil said: "I won't be doing any dating apps. I've never done a dating app - there weren't any when I was last single.

"I'm just going to stick to dancing for the time being."

Of his former wife still wearing her wedding ring while he doesn't, Neil said: "We're not together any more.

"I never used to wear my wedding ring when we were dancing, that was just something for me because I don't really like jewellery.

"But Katya, you know, she just likes her jewellery, so if she's wearing it, she's wearing it."

He went on to reveal: "We're really good friends and we're in a really good place right now."

(Image: PA)

Alex and Neil were due to perform a commercial/street routine to the Ghostbusters theme for Strictly’s Halloween special last night, but their plans were scuppered when Neil was forced to pull out due to an injury.

In his place, reigning champion Kevin Clifton stepped in to partner Alex, giving him just 45 minutes to learn an entire routine.

Alex and Kevin secured a total of 34 points out of a possible 40, and received a standing ovation from the audience.

Strictly Come Dancing: The Results is on BBC One at 7.15pm on Sunday.

description: Pro dancer Neil Jones confirmed that dating is the last thing on his mind right now following the end of his marriage
